articles.description: Any potential resumption of the Indian Premier League would depend on the "mood of the nation", according to former India wicketkeeper Deep Dasgupta.
articles.title: IPL: 'Mood of the nation' will decide Indian Premier League restart, says Deep Dasgupta

articles.description: Xabi Alonso will succeed Carlo Ancelotti as Real Madrid manager next season. Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at the challenges ahead.
articles.title: Xabi Alonso: A new era at Real Madrid with Carlo Ancelotti's successor decided

articles.description: Fifa announces that the Women's World Cup will be expanded from 32 to 48 teams from the 2031 tournament.
articles.title: Women's World Cup to be expanded to 48 teams from 2031

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Coventry City face Sunderland in the first leg of the Championship play-off semi-final.
articles.title: Coventry City v Sunderland LIVE: Championship play-off semi-final score & updates

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland is ready to make his return from injury against Southampton this weekend, manager Pep Guardiola says.
articles.title: Erling Haaland 'ready and fit' to return from injury, Pep Guardiola confirms

articles.description: The Pakistan Super League is postponed indefinitely, after initial plans to move the tournament to the United Arab Emirates were scrapped.
articles.title: PSL 2025: Plan to stage rest of season in UAE is abandoned

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot is "disappointed" to be losing "a very good full-back" in Trent Alexander-Arnold and hints that the England international is set to join Real Madrid.
articles.title: Liverpool boss Arne Slot on Trent Alexander-Arnold future - 'we both know where he's going'

articles.description: Northampton Saints flanker Henry Pollock says his selection on Thursday for the British and Irish Lions' tour of Australia was "the best day of his life".
articles.title: Henry Pollock: Northampton flanker on making the British and Irish Lions squad for Australia

articles.description: Ukraine's Marta Kostyuk praises Daria Kasatkina's "courage" in switching nationalities from Russia to Australia before the pair shake hands after their match at the Italian Open.
articles.title: Italian Open: Ukraine's Marta Kostyuk praises Daria Kasatkina's 'courage' in criticising Russian invasion and switching nationalities

articles.description: Denmark's Mads Pedersen wins the first stage of the Giro d'Italia from Wout van Aert in Albania, while Mikel Landa fractures his back in a late crash.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Mikel Landa injured in crash as Mads Pedersen wins in Albania
